name: Channara Tom Pheap
description:
A 33-year-old man shot and killed in a confrontation with a Knoxville police officer Monday night had been in trouble in the past, but was working to be a better man and father, his best friend said.

Authorities identified Channara Tom "Philly" Pheap as the man who was fatally shot during a "physical altercation" with a Knoxville Police Department officer at Clear Springs Apartments, off Merchant Drive.

Read more: https://knoxne.ws/2U87l2d
